meanings.definition: A person who maintains or takes care of grounds, especially at a sports field or park.
meanings.sent1: The groundsmen mowed the grass on the soccer field.
meanings.sent2: The park groundsmen planted new flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The groundsmen joked that they were the kings of the turf.
meanings.sent4: The diligent groundsmen were the unsung heroes of the stadium.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated groundsmen worked tirelessly to keep the grounds pristine.
